item.description:
For the July Sailing Meetup, we are invited to an event sponsored by SailTime Boston and Constitution Yacht Club that will offer an opportunity to meet and talk with members of these two organizations about sailing opportunities here in Boston. Membership in a yacht club such as Constitution Yacht Club will provide you the opportunity to meet other sailors (with boats and without), get involved in the sailing community, learn about sailing seminars and social events, and enjoy opportunities to get out on the water. Membership in a sailing organization such as SailTime will provide you with training, practice, and lots of time on the water.

The event will take place from 6-9pm on the outdoor deck at the Constitution Marina, 28 Constitution Road in Charlestown.

Stop standing on the shore while others get involved!
item.name: The Boston Sailing July Meetup
